name: Snake Shift
description: A Universe Project Game Jam game 16/7/2019. To meet the challenge of making a game revolving around Transformations, we created this simple platformer as an original concept for physics riddle games. The player may only change the shape of the snake avatar through a list of 4 shapes . Getting to the goal Mouse will require correctly timing the shape swap to navigate through the desert maze relying only on gravity and momentum to keep going.
